Program Information.Duration: 12 months (2 semesters in-class, 1 semester work experience)

Contact Related Information:
Summary:
George Brown College offers regular on-campus information sessions for domestic students to learn about programs, career options, and meet professors (sign up at admissions@georgebrown.ca or visit Admissions section). For inquiries about international admission, contact international recruitment representatives (book virtual meeting or submit inquiry via International Contact Us page). Financial aid-related queries should be directed to the Financial Aid Office (FinAid@georgebrown.ca or Financial Aid section). To schedule an appointment with an Entry Advisor for advice on program options, make an appointment. For specific questions about the Centre for Business and Sport & Event Marketing program, contact Peter Widdis (pwiddis@georgebrown.ca) or John Peco (john.peco@georgebrown.ca).

Key Contact Details:
- Admissions Office: admissions@georgebrown.ca
- Financial Aid Office: FinAid@georgebrown.ca
- International Contact Us page
